name: Delicious Sakura Shrimp Crackers
desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. The lovely hue of the Sakura Bloom is perfectly preserved, as is the elegant flowing shape of the Shrimp. Before you even put it in your mouth, you can already taste the fresh fragrance rushing up your nose. The crispy, refreshing flavor spreads throughout your mouth as you chew, with every bite showing off more of the mingled wonders of sakura and sea.

customize.name: Recipe: Sakura Shrimp Crackers
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sakura Shrimp Crackers.

customize.name: Shrimp Meat
customize.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Sakura Bloom
customize.desc: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

customize.name: Sakura Shrimp Crackers
customize.desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. Potatoes are ground into flour and added to Shrimp and Sakura Blooms before being baked in an oven. It possesses a lovely flavor profile for a snack and is beloved by people of all ages, traits that have made it a popular choice of gift.

customize.name: Suspicious Sakura Shrimp Crackers
customize.desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. The result looks a little dull, though the round shape does indicate that these are indeed "senbei" crackers... albeit ones that taste more like rank "Shrimp" than anything else.

value.text: Increases all party members' Max HP by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
